_sText: Fibbs Visual Counter/Timer _______________ Like Fibbs said: A logic_timer adds 1 to the counter every second, which sends its current value to the logic_case. The logic_case compares the number input from the math_counter to the cases it has, and fires the first case that matches. Depending on which case is fired, it enables or disables each func_brush to show the number. When a counter hits its max it adds 1 to the next counter, which controls another digit. Fibbs Timer/Counter maximum value was 99. my Timer/Counter goes to 59 and after the next second adds a minute: Fibbs Timer: 59 to 60 ... 99 to 00 My Timer: 0:59 to 1:00 ... 9:59 to 0:00 the improved counter/timer works until it reaches 9 minutes and 59 seconds while fibbs counter works until it reaches 99 seconds. Theres a Start, Stop and Reset Button. _______________ Please credit Fibbs and me if you use this in your map!
